title: Nothing is going right for Azir :(
body:
My poor Azir

Firstly cos some stupid pro used him like twice in a championship, now he is in so many games (from a low 2% to steady 10% pick rate and growing, and mirror Azir lanes are the worst type of mirror lanes) 

because he is picked more often his ban rate has gone up to 20+% so the chance that you could play him in ranked are now 28% less. 

Then he gets a SKT T1 skin just to add insult to injury, which means all the pro wannabes wont ever leave him alone, and his pick rate will soar.

He is countered (post 6) by one of the biggest menace champs of the current time (that if you don't ban will be in every game without fail) 

The 1 other ascended champ on his side, and his long lost granddaughter, think very little of him. 

Then we just find out that half the world thinks he is enslaving everyone in Shurima, when his last act in life was actually to make sure that no Shuriman would ever wear chains again, when his actual goal is to rally his people and make their country great again. 

Not only is the killer of his family that was once his best friend, and now arch enemy, Still alive and trying to kill him. But now he has a Stone mage (whose magic is probably the most similar to his out of all the other champs (seeing how sand and stone are essentially the same thing)) from his own country trying to kill him. AND is now disliked by one of the coolest champs of ionia as a result. 


Poor Azir :(

Riot please help him out by giving him a big old nerf for his birthday (or just any other day) to get some of these wannabe pro fanboy copycats off his back!

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body: I don't understand the point of this, you're obviously an azir player but you want him to be nerfed just so others don't play him? Little selfish don't you think
